name: Portfolio
tagline: Collection of selected projects from the past decade or so that I've been recording them.
body: Welcome to the new, more modern, and hopefully more up-to-date incarnation of my project portfolio. Largely, this was established for MIT admissions, then maintained for job applications, and now serves as a slick repository for as much design data as I can digitize. Look around and enjoy! -Thomas
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
